predictions.text: The price of Cryptocurrencies will increase by 20% within the next month due to the passage of the Genius Act and three regulatory bills in Congress.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average will decrease by 15% in the next quarter amid increasing evidence on vaping risks and FDA approval of Juul vapes.
Tesla stock will rise by 10% in the next three months following Elon Musk clearing final obstacles for Tesla in India.
The value of the US Dollar will decrease by 5% against major currencies in the next six months due to Trump's policy on China's costs.
The California real estate market will experience a 5% downturn in the next year as a result of the state aiming to counter Texas on redistricting.
